title: Reset In-Car User Profile
description: A customer has bought a used car and wants to delete the previous owner's user profile and settings from the infotainment system.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to the 'Settings' menu on the infotainment screen.
Instruct the customer on how to perform a 'Factory Reset' or 'Master Reset' of the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent guides the customer through the reset process.

tasks.description: Explain that this will erase all personal data, including saved addresses and paired phones, and then guide them to create their own new profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly sets expectations and helps the customer set up their new profile.
